commitMessageScript: #!/usr/bin/env bash  # === CONFIGURATION === VAULT_PATH="$HOME/Documents/ObsidianVault"   # Path to your Obsidian vault GEMINI_MODEL="gemini-2.5-pro"              # or gemini-1.5-pro for higher quality summaries  # === EXECUTION === cd "$VAULT_PATH" || { echo "Vault not found"; exit 1; }  # Detect changes CHANGES=$(git diff --name-only HEAD)  if [ -z "$CHANGES" ]; then   echo "No changes to commit."   exit 0 fi  # Prepare diff summary (limit output for brevity) DIFF_SUMMARY=$(git diff --stat)  # Prompt Gemini CLI for a concise commit message AI_SUMMARY=$(gemini "$GEMINI_MODEL" --prompt \ "Write a short, professional Git commit message (max 15 words) summarising the following changes to Markdown notes:  Changed files: $CHANGES  Diff summary: $DIFF_SUMMARY " 2>/dev/null)  # Fallback if Gemini returns nothing if [ -z "$AI_SUMMARY" ]; then   AI_SUMMARY="Update notes" fi  # Format commit message COMMIT_MSG="vault: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M') — $AI_SUMMARY"  # Run Git commit and push git add . git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" git push  echo "✅ Committed with message:" echo "$COMMIT_MSG"
